import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; type Props = { show: boolean, user: any, modalHandler: () => void }; export const Modal = (props: Props) => { const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [role, setRole] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { if (props.user) { setName(props.user.name); setEmail(props.user.email); setRole(props.user.role); } }, [props.user]) return (
